title: 1.147 STATE GEMSTONE.
text:
The Lake Superior agate is the official gemstone of the state of Minnesota.
A photograph and a typical specimen of the Lake Superior agate shall be preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.

variables.name: official_gemstone
variables.description: Indicates if the Lake Superior agate is recognized as the official gemstone.

variables.name: state
variables.description: Indicates if the state in question is Minnesota.

consequences: A photograph and a typical specimen of the Lake Superior agate shall be preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.
